Leave Type Maximum Leaves Edit
{{leave.name}} {{leave.maxLeaves}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { JwtService } from '../jwt.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-displayleave', templateUrl: './displayleave.component.html', styleUrls: ['./displayleave.component.scss'] }) export class DisplayleaveComponent implements OnInit{ ngOnInit(): void { } leaves:any = null; constructor(private service:JwtService){ this.getLeaveDetails(); } getLeaveDetails(){ this.service.getLeaves().subscribe( (resp)=>{ console.log(resp); this.leaves=resp; console.log("this is",this.leaves.id); }, (err)=>{ console.log(err); } ) } }
